segments.text: Can I help you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm here for the backpack you announced several minutes ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , take a seat please , sir . First of all , can you show me your ID please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Here you are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , could you please tell me what your backpack looks like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , it's a soft leather one , you know , not a sports one that looks childish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mmm ... does it zip closed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it's straps closed , and it has a buckle in the front .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , can you tell me the distinguishing features of this backpack ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yeah , the brand name .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So what's it , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's a Polo . It has the logo on the back and at the bottom in the left-hand corner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , can you name the items in it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , all the gifts for my family , you know , two pairs of sneakers for my children and a bottle of perfume for my wife .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , sir , I'm sure it's your bag . Thank you for your cooperation . You can have it now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you so much . You guys are really responsible .
segments.speaker: S2
